title: That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOPC24-003, dated April 8, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That the Minutes of Settlement between the City and CUPE 504 dated March 7, 2024 that sets out new terms for a Collective Agreement covering the three-year period January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2026, be approved.
That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-003 dated April 8, 2024, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from Police Chief Betts be received for information.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSMLES24-002, dated April 8, 2024 of the Commissioner, Legislative Services as follows: That Council pass a by-law in the form of amending by-law comprising Appendix A to Report LSMLES24-002 to amend Parks and Facilities By-law 19-074.
That this meeting be adjourned at 6:45 p.m.
